laboratory_examinations.findings: FECES NEGATIVE FOR C. DIFFICILE TOXIN BY EIA. (Reference Range-Negative).

Small bilateral pleural effusions and adjacent atelectasis, small hiatal hernia, liver shows a small focus of enhancement posteriorly at the dome (may represent a hemangioma), tiny amount of fluid within the gallbladder fossa, biliary stent and subhepatic drain in place, pneumobilia present, fat stranding and fluid surrounding the pancreas, no focal lesions identified elsewhere.
